name: Strac
headline: Data Discovery, DLP, DSPM for SaaS, Cloud, Gen AI & Endpoints
description:
Strac is an agentless Data Discovery (aka DSPM - Data Security Posture Management) & DLP (Data Leak Prevention) that automatically discovers, classifies and remediates sensitive data (alert, label, redact, mask, block, delete). 

Strac protects SaaS, Cloud, Gen AI and Endpoints like O365, Slack, GDrive, AWS, Salesforce, ChatGPT, Jira, Mac, Zendesk, and 40+ integrations. 

Strac protects enterprise companies like UiPath, ThredUP, Nylas, Crypto (dot) com!

founders.name: Aatish Mandelecha, Founder
founders.description: Aatish spent 11 years at Amazon building their payments infrastructure (Widget, API and Security) including payment secure zone on AWS securing their credit cards, bank accounts and payment partners.

### “Strac protects our customer support communication channels”
To protect our clients as well as ourselves, we needed a secure way to protect our communication channels for security and compliance reasons. We used Strac's Email Redaction solution where Strac protects all our employee inboxes. The redaction experience is _beautiful, easy, and secure._ It catches all kinds of sensitive pdfs, jpegs, images, word docs, and even in email bodies. The integration was up and running in a few minutes. The service offered by Strac's team is the best I have seen as we work with a lot of SaaS providers.We **Highly Recommend** Strac to all businesses who want to protect their SaaS apps.
Nathan Seifert
Head of IT at Trivium
![Trivium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/6436ef5af2c25a15ce7d603e_Trivium_Logo_2.webp)
![Nathan Seifert Portrait](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/6436eeb8bf2b13cb4ec82624_Nathan_Seifert.webp)
### “Strac secures our PII on customer support and on backend servers”
On our Intercom customer support, anyone can send sensitive data to a business and a business is liable even if they did not ask for it. Strac solves that huge problem by automatically redacting sensitive data that is shared over Intercom with their accurate machine learning technology. We also leveraged Strac's Zero Data architecture via tokenization & proxy APIs so that we don't have to worry about touching sensitive data and documents on our backend servers. Strac dramatically reduces security and SOC compliance risks for us while significantly improving security posture for Seis. Strac's solutions were extremely easy to integrate (literally in few minutes) and scaled to meet our needs.
Josh Howland
CTO and Co-Founder at Seis
![seis logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/642a7ac3e48f6a4a3d2e68cb_seis-logo.webp)
![Josh Portrait](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/642a7a05daa7966f618afba0_Josh-CTO.webp)
### “Loved Strac's Interceptor Solution”
We leverage Strac's tokenization & interceptor solution so that we don't have to worry touching sensitive SSNs and can leverage Strac's security expertise in building hundreds of security controls.We could also detect identity fraud using Strac's unique tokenization solution which we are really happy with. That saved us a ton of financial losses and headaches. We are looking forward to integrating with various other Strac solutions deep into our tech stack.
Kevin Hopkins
CTO at Zeta

## Data Discovery & DSPM

### Scan Sensitive Data 
Scan sensitive files and documents across all SaaS apps, Cloud apps on AWS, Azure, GCP using our machine learning and OCR models
![Shield Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/61b258bb599d17c6a61d92ff_icon-4-home-perks-dark-template.svg)

After scanning all sensitive data, remediate those findings via removing public access, applying labels, redaction, masking, blocking, alerting, deletion.

### Historical Scanning

## Protect Data on your AWS, Azure & GCP
![Shield Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/61b258bb599d17c6a61d92ff_icon-4-home-perks-dark-template.svg)
### Tokenize ANY Data
Tokenization is the most secure way to store any sensitive data; hence PCI has mandated it for Credit Cards. Apply the same technology for your sensitive data.
[Learn More](https://www.strac.io/<https:/www.strac.io/blog/why-should-you-protect-sensitive-data-like-pii-credit-card>)
![Icon with three dots](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b258bb599d177e751d9288/61b258bb599d17c6f81d92fe_icon-2-home-perks-dark-template.svg)
### Display, Search or Send Data
Perform any operation on the tokenized data, e.g. search, display data on any website via our custom iFrames, send data to any endpoint (including third party partner) over HTTPS or SFTP.

### “Strac protects our customer support communication channels”
To protect our clients as well as ourselves, we needed a secure way to protect our communication channels for security and compliance reasons. We used Strac's Email Redaction solution where Strac protects all our employee inboxes. The redaction experience is _beautiful, easy, and secure._ It catches all kinds of sensitive pdfs, jpegs, images, word docs, and even in email bodies. The integration was up and running in a few minutes. The service offered by Strac's team is the best I have seen as we work with a lot of SaaS providers.We **Highly Recommend** Strac to all businesses who want to protect their SaaS apps.
Nathan Seifert
Head of IT at Trivium
![Trivium Logo⟨82⟩]
![Nathan Seifert Portrait⟨83⟩]
### “Strac secures our PII on customer support and on backend servers”
On our Intercom customer support, anyone can send sensitive data to a business and a business is liable even if they did not ask for it. Strac solves that huge problem by automatically redacting sensitive data that is shared over Intercom with their accurate machine learning technology. We also leveraged Strac's Zero Data architecture via tokenization & proxy APIs so that we don't have to worry about touching sensitive data and documents on our backend servers. Strac dramatically reduces security and SOC compliance risks for us while significantly improving security posture for Seis. Strac's solutions were extremely easy to integrate (literally in few minutes) and scaled to meet our needs.
Josh Howland
CTO and Co-Founder at Seis
![seis logo⟨84⟩]
![Josh Portrait⟨85⟩]
### “Loved Strac's Interceptor Solution”
We leverage Strac's tokenization & interceptor solution so that we don't have to worry touching sensitive SSNs and can leverage Strac's security expertise in building hundreds of security controls.We could also detect identity fraud using Strac's unique tokenization solution which we are really happy with. That saved us a ton of financial losses and headaches. We are looking forward to integrating with various other Strac solutions deep into our tech stack.
Kevin Hopkins
CTO at Zeta

generated_description:
Strac is a cutting-edge data security firm focused on helping businesses discover, classify, and protect their sensitive data in various environments. Founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, Strac operates from Bellevue, WA, with a small but expert team of 8 employees. They creatively harness the latest in Artificial Intelligence, particularly around Generative AI. 

The company's mission revolves around Data Discovery, Data Loss Prevention (DLP), and Data Security Posture Management (DSPM), specifically tailored for SaaS applications, Cloud services, Generative AI platforms, and endpoints. Their approach is agentless, meaning they can effectively discover and remediate sensitive information without installing software on each device. 

Strac's product suite can automatically identify, label, redact, mask, block, or delete sensitive data in real time. They offer impressive integration capabilities, supporting over 40 platforms, including well-known services such as Office 365, Slack, Google Drive, AWS, and Salesforce. Their clients include notable enterprises like UiPath, ThredUP, Nylas, and even Crypto.com, underscoring their credibility in the market.

Key features include:

- **SaaS DLP**: Spotting and managing sensitive information across SaaS applications.
- **Endpoint DLP**: Protecting data at endpoint devices, enhancing the enterprise data security layer.
- **Email Security**: Ensures confidential data isn't exposed in email communications.
- **Sensitive Data Scanning**: They provide accurate scanning across all endpoints and cloud solutions, helping organizations stay compliant with regulations like HIPAA, PCI, and GDPR.
  
The firm is led by prominent figures in the startup ecosystem, including Michael Seibel as their Group Partner. With their innovative techniques and commitment to security, Strac positions itself as a guardian of sensitive data, paving the way for safer business operations in an increasingly digital world.

To learn more about Strac and their solutions, visit their website at [strac.io](https://www.strac.io).
